task.title: Installing
task.shortdesc: Requirements, and how to install the in the DITA OT

ul.li: You have downloaded and extracted the DITA Open Toolkit

taskbody.context: You want to install the in your DITA Open Toolkit.

step.cmd: Extract /dita2rdf/dita2rdf-ditaot-plugin.zip to [DITA-OT]/plugins, [DITA-OT] being the directory of your DITA open toolkit installation.
Run [DITA-OT]/startcmd.bat (or [DITA-OT]/startcmd.sh if you run a Linux operating system)A new console window opens.
Run the command ant -f integrator.xml strict at the root of your DITA open toolkit installation.

taskbody.result: The dita2rdf DITA OT plugin is installed in your DITA OT installation and the rdf transtype is available.
